channel.title: Get started on Security365 Docs
channel.description: Recent content in Get started on Security365 Docs

item.title: Guide
item.description: Get started guideThis guide will instruct you through setting up a Cloudflare account to deploying your first Worker. This guide assumes that you already have a Cloudflare account. If you do not have a Cloudflare account, sign up External link icon Open external link before continuing. Try the PlaygroundThe quickest way to experiment with Cloudflare Workers is in the Playground External link icon Open external link . The Playground does not require any setup.

item.title: Quickstarts
item.description: QuickstartsQuickstarts are GitHub repos that are designed to be a starting point for building a new Cloudflare Workers project. For the projects below, you simply run: $ npx wrangler generate <new-project-name> <github-repo-url> new-project-name A folder with this name will be created with your new project inside, pre-configured to your Workers account. github-repo-url This is the URL of the GitHub repo starter, as below. ​â€‹ Templates JavaScript Starter External link icon Open external link A bare-bones Workers starter project, in JavaScript.
